item.title: Spring-ws SOAP 'No adapter for endpoint'
item.description: Why am I using SOAP? I don’t want to talk about it. Basically I have a need for a Spring MVC project to provide a Spring-ws SOAP endpoint. After following the Spring documentation here and downloading the source code here I noticed something. The documentation is using jdom for marshalling. While the source code is using jdom2.
